results.title: Statins for age-related macular degeneration.
results.text_hl: Both trials compared @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ versus placebo in older people (> 50 or 60 years) with high risk of developing @<m>DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@ (@DISEASE_Retinal_Drusen @DISEASE_MESH:D015593 @@@drusen@@@ present on examination).

results.title: Can HMG Co-A reductase inhibitors ("statins") slow the progression of age-related macular degeneration? The Age-Related Maculopathy Statin Study (ARMSS)
results.text_hl: To assess the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on macular visual function in early @<m>DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@.
